alert.note: Alert for Monroe; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 21 at 2:33PM CDT until October 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: .Red Flag Warning extended into southwest Illinois until 7 PM today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CRITICAL FIRE CONDITIONS FOR CENTRAL AND EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST MISSOURI AND SOUTHWEST ILLINOIS... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 034 Monroe MO, Fire Weather Zone 035 Ralls MO, Fire Weather Zone 036 Pike MO, Fire Weather Zone 041 Boone MO, Fire Weather Zone 042 Audrain MO, Fire Weather Zone 047 Moniteau MO, Fire Weather Zone 048 Cole MO, Fire Weather Zone 049 Osage MO, Fire Weather Zone 050 Callaway MO, Fire Weather Zone 051 Montgomery MO, Fire Weather Zone 052 Lincoln MO, Fire Weather Zone 059 Gasconade MO, Fire Weather Zone 060 Warren MO, Fire Weather Zone 061 Saint Charles MO, Fire Weather Zone 062 Franklin MO, Fire Weather Zone 063 Saint Louis MO, Fire Weather Zone 064 Saint Louis City MO, Fire Weather Zone 065 Jefferson MO, Fire Weather Zone 101 Saint Clair IL and Fire Weather Zone 102 Monroe IL. * TIMING...Noon through 700 pm. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 80.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
